full_summary:
## Government Tender Announcement
### Invitation to Bid
#### For the supply and delivery of Electric Shuttle Vehicles
The Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC) is issuing an invitation to bid for the supply and delivery of two electric shuttle vehicles for use at Lower Fort Garry National Historic Site of Canada.

#### Project Overview
The Electric Shuttle Vehicles will be used to transport visitors around the site for tours during the spring, summer, and fall months.

#### Essential Tender Information
* **Reference Number:** WS3628104005
* **Publication Date:** October 12, 2022
* **Tender Closing Date:** November 29, 2022 at 14:00 EST (2:00 PM)
* **Expected Contract Start Date:** Not specified
* **Expected Contract End Date:** May 31, 2024
* **Trade Agreements:** Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)
* **Regions of Opportunity:** No restrictions
* **Regions of Delivery:** Manitoba

#### Tender Criteria
The Parks Canada Agency is seeking a compliant bid with the lowest evaluated price for the award of this contract.

#### Contractor Evaluation
The selection of the successful bidder will be based on their ability to meet the mandatory evaluation criteria outlined in the Compliance Matrix.

#### Further Information
For more information on this tender, please refer to the official Government of Canada source available at [http://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/14345672?extsite=MTQzNDU2NzJfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==](http://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/14345672?extsite=MTQzNDU2NzJfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==).
